channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Israel weighs West Bank annexations in response to Palestine recognition push
item.description: The Israeli government is seriously debating the annexation of parts of the occupied West Bank in retaliation for the imminent recognition of Palestin...

item.title: How RFK Jr. and MAHA flipped the script on big business
item.description: The MAHA movement has scrambled political alliances by forcing a Republican administration to choose between placating its base — which is intent on c...

item.title: RFK Jr. and MAHA fuel America's battle with food
item.description: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr.'s “Make America Healthy Again” movement has thrown the nation's public health leadership into chaos — but it's ...

item.title: RFK Jr. splinters Americans over vaccines and food regulation
item.description: Americans across the political spectrum support efforts to increase food regulation, a major priority for Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. — but...

item.title: Blocking tariffs would be "end of the United States," top Trump adviser says
item.description: It would be "the end of the United States" if President Trump 's sweeping global tariffs are ultimately struck down by the Supreme Court, White House ...

item.title: Trump redefines conservatism, setting up a fight over its future
item.description: On one issue after another, the president has scrambled what used to be fundamental conservative beliefs.

item.title: As RFK Jr. upends America’s public health system, Trump cheers him on
item.description: Trump pledged that he’d empower Robert F. Kennedy Jr. to “go wild” on health care. The president has kept his promise.

item.title: An appeals court said Trump couldn’t levy his tariffs. What happens now?
item.description: Despite the ruling, the appellate judges let President Donald Trump’s tariffs stand to allow time for a likely appeal to the U.S. Supreme Court.

item.title: Ruling on Trump’s tariffs is a major setback for the White House
item.description: An appellate court ruling could stymie the import taxes that Trump has used to raise revenue, negotiate with foreign leaders and even head off global ...

item.title: The political ‘diploma divide’ now applies to members of Congress
item.description: A new study shows that over the past 50 years, fewer and fewer Republicans have attended elite colleges, while an increasing share of Democrats attend...

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
